dailyGoals: Finish the blog builder app, and study algorithms.

tasks.taskDescription: Implement Quill Editor integration for notes.
tasks.notes: Started integrating the Quill editor, faced some challenges with toolbar customization.
tasks.reflection: Quill was more challenging than expected, but it's working now.
tasks.nextSteps: Test integration with other parts of the blog builder.

tasks.notes: Cleaned up the JavaScript code, streamlined the process for gathering blog data.
tasks.reflection: Refactoring made the code much cleaner and easier to maintain.
tasks.nextSteps: Add more tasks and test the export functionality with a larger dataset.

dailyReflection: Today was productive, though Quill integration took more time than expected.
nextSteps: Test the app, improve UI, and start working on database integration.
